items.title: Today, was a hectic day
items.desc: Today was a very hectic day, I got completely messed up...had a fight with my best friend..but this time he was wrong.. Tomorrow is my Physics Exam, I forgot what I've learnt till now..Every word seems out of outline.. I wish some miracle happens and exam goes well.. things turned out to be right, Please Heaven

items.title: I Want To Be A Doctor
items.desc: Last night, i was dreaming that i become a doctor. I help people that needs my help. It was a lot of fun.
